text: N’imikuba ibahwikiye nk’ibicu baca batabaza Imana n’ubwitonzi ntangere, mugabo imaze kubarokora ikabashikana kunkengera z’ikiyaga muribo baca bafata urugendo ruri hagati na hagati rwiza nayo abandi barahakana imigisha y’Imana, kandi ntabahakana imigisha y’Imana atari uwoba yihenze mukuru ariwe muhakanyi karuhariwe
